Key Match Events: Amen Thompson was involved in a mass brawl and will miss the next two matches
Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Rockets have the best defense in the league, allowing only 106.6 points per game, and are third in the Western Conference with a 21-11 record.
The Rockets have recently lost two consecutive games, including a blown 15-point lead against Minnesota and a close loss to Miami.
The Dallas Mavericks are dealing with three losses in their last four games due to the absence of Luka Doncic, who is expected to miss about a month.
The Mavericks recently beat Phoenix but lost to Sacramento and Portland, and their performance may decline further without Doncic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Betting odds for the game include Total Under 222.5 and Total 2 Under 108.5.
